name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. David G. BUCKNO, Appellant

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, zappala and papadakos, jj.
ZAPPALA, J., dissents and would reach the merits.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. David G. BUCKNO, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
ZAPPALA, J., dissents and would reach the merits.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Richard J. Orloski, Allentown, for appellant.
casebody.head_matter:
537 A.2d 811
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. David G. BUCKNO, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 22, 1988.
Decided Feb. 25, 1988.
Richard J. Orloski, Allentown, for appellant.
Emil Kantra, Allentown, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, zappala and papadakos, jj.
